# Stop Heart (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 4]], [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 8]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S, Drug

**Range:** Touch

**Area:** One living humanoid or animal

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC)­, pg. 106

Channeling hatred and spite, the caster calls upon dark power to give the subject a massive heart attack. The subject suddenly drops to –8 hit points, then –9 hit points at the end of this round. If someone immediately makes a successful [[Heal (Skill)|Heal]] check (DC 15) or somehow gives the subject more hit points, she stabilizes. Otherwise, at the end of the next round, the subject reaches –10 hit points and dies.

*Drug Component:* Baccaran.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* If you are using the Constitution modifier rule (cf. death is reached at -10 + Con modifier) this spell still only drops the target to -8, then failure to stablize results in a 1 point lose.
